current_task: Recording Solr index restore - ready to proceed
message: Good news! Investigated the corrupted recording index issue. MusicBrainz has fresh Solr 9 backups available (Dec 6, 2025). Our local Solr is already upgraded to 9.7.0, so we can restore directly without any version upgrade. Ready to download and restore the 46GB recording.tar.zst backup when approved.

investigation_results.other_collections: All 14 other collections healthy with data

next_steps: Restore backup to Solr recording collection
Verify document count (should be ~35+ million recordings)
notes: MusicBrainz migrated to Solr 9 in May 2025. Old Solr 7 backups stopped being updated June 28, 2025. Since we're already on Solr 9.7.0, the new backups are compatible.
